main_definition: In English, 'he' is a pronoun used to refer to a male person or animal previously mentioned or easily identified in context.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used as an emphatic response when one agrees with another
meanings_and_examples.example: 'He!' exclaimed the man, showing his approval.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used to express that something is happening or will happen in a surprising way
meanings_and_examples.example: 'He'll be back soon,' she said, surprised at how quickly he had left.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A colloquial use referring to an unspecified person of either gender (often considered non-standard or informal)
meanings_and_examples.example: 'Why did they do that?' 'He', I guess?

additional_definitions.definition: Used to point out a specific male individual in an ongoing conversation, especially when the person's identity is already known or implied
additional_definitions.example: 'He,' I said again, pointing towards my brother.

additional_definitions.definition: Refers to a man as a general reference without specifying who he is within the context of the conversation
additional_definitions.example: 'When will he be ready?' asked about an unnamed male.
